description: PsyCamp serves up the psychedelic experience with a healthy dose of black lights, chill space, yoga, henna, and improv theater, good company, and some third-eye-worthy cosmic laughs. Slide in on the serpent’s tongue, paint some tribal marks on your skin, and chill in the belly of the beast.

name: Psychofunkodiscodelic & Brass Tax
description: Keepin’ it sweet and funky on the desert flo’!

name: Puddin' Tang
description: This year at Burning Man, the ancient powdered rivals of the Puddin’ Posse and the Tang Gang battle for playa supremacy! Sip a frothy Tangarita, throw back a few pudding shots, and join the struggle!

name: Pyromid
description: Not to be missed; The Pyromid. Oh yes, it returneth. Sunday night’s burn is guaranteed to give you that personal, up and close, feeling of the Burner.

name: Radio Electra 103.9
description: Radio Electra 103.9, (formerly radio anarchy) will return to Black Rock City with an eclectic array of Music, News and Commentary. Villages and Theme Camps wishing to announce playa events are welcome to stop in.

name: Reaplaya
description: 1. Build triangle shelters with playa glued to the plywood as camoflage. Line these structures up at 225 degrees with a view of the man looking down each structure. Rebuild the granite range on the playa by reapplying playa and water into a clay structure of the range. Floating world.

name: RECHARGE!!!
description: Quench your thirst, and cleanse your sensory palate at RECHARGE!!! Come join us for our afternoon Hai/Tea/Ku Salon: we’ll have delicious iced tea and salon delights; you compose an on-the-spot haiku for the Big Book!

name: Reincarnation Location
description: Confess your sins, serve pennance and be reborn through our 6′ vagina adjacent to our 2 24′ diameter breasts, then dance the night away or relax in our pillow room.

name: Reno Philosophants
description: The playa roach thought extinct was found in Baldini’s Casino. We hope to restore it to its natural habitat of the Black Rock. Pioneers called it the buffalo of the Great Basin.

name: RISA
description: Risa is an infamously lush resort planet renowned for its breezes and easy-going, uninhibited sexuality. Come visit the music bar in the tie-dye dome. Thursday night party as usual.

name: Rococo Risque
description: Rococo Risque will offer the national and international cabaret driven, circus twirling, street performance artist a haven to explore the riches of their artistic self with a night of puppet karaoke hosted by the Lord of the Karaoke, a cabaret style cocktail hour, and other impromptu acts of social inequity!!!

name: Sacred Heart Oasis
description: Sacred Heart Oasis — We will be a Harbor Beacon with an alternative energy twist (located in AEZ Village). We invite all to be Alladin, the genie, a whirling dervish, belly dancer, or whatever. Providing Arabic music, games, and a nice place to chill, create, and share. Prizes for participants.

name: Sacred Land Project
description: The Sacred Land Project is a SF based but globally minded promotional organization with goals that include uniting the electronic underground into a network of unified resources, creating safe, sustainable areas of land to hold our gatherings on, and assisting other grooups with similar views. We are hosting a BREAKS OF DAWN, a breakbeat dance gathering on Thursday August 29th. Guests include Sunz of Mecha, Miss Bliss, Imri, Smalls & DJ Ripple. Others TBA.

name: Sacred Playground
description: Sacred Playground is a gift from the heart of the Berkeley Toltec Center of Creative Intent, a shamanic center that supports the discovery of divinity through self-acceptance and personal freedom. We are providing a sacred, grounding dome, sunset healing circles, and elemental rituals to give Burners the opportunity to recharge their energy and come back to their centers in between roaming the Floating Worlds of Burning Man 2002. We intend to do our part to magically support the highest good for all participants at the event, whether or not we connect with you individually.

name: Safari Social Club
description: On safari at a playa near you. Please refrain from teasing the caged specimens.

name: Scurvy Monkey
description: Got Scurvy? Join the Scurvy Monkey for high tea and vitamin C. Tea times as posted.

name: Sea Monkey
description: Come and play at Camp Sea Monkey! Home to buried treasure, scavenger hunts, tons of games, and some of the most crazy monkeys around.

name: Sea of Reverie
description: Come join this shipwrecked crew for painting,scavanger hunt (sign up by Wednesday 11am), Happy Hour(s) Thursday 4pm-7pm, Drinks, questionaire and gifts. View the shipwreck of the HMS REVERIE & share your stories & culture as we help to document the many tribes of this amazing Black Rock Island.

name: Secret Cove
description: Sail through the Straits of Black Rock and past the Great Bare Rear Reef to the Isle of Ill Repute. There you will discover Poseidon’s Pleasure Palace and the Mermaids Womb bar which lies within.

name: Sinner Camp
description: As an alternative to the year after year center camp, we now offer a new and more exciting SINNER CAMP! Break commandments, say the name of the lord in vain, come to hell where all the fun is and undo organized religion.

name: Sky People
description: The Sky People invite you to experience the space above Black Rock City. Stop by to share our unique view of the Floating World.

name: SlutMonkeys High Jinx High
description: Come play with the Slut Monkeys at High Jinx High. Twirl poi, play drums, roll around with fuzzy snakes… activities begin daily at 4:20.

name: Snowflake Village
description: Snowflake Village is a home for artists from across the Midwest and Canada. We bring our unique perspective and our hospitality. In Snowflake Village there are fire performances, games, a dance tent, movies, a fire circus… meet someone at Speed Dating Dome, visit the Pumpkin Lounge, then afterwards, the Drive-thru Confessional… All in one village! See you there.

name: Soft Rock Cafe
description: “The Soft Rock Cafe… just add water. When soft rock is heard, pancakes will be served.”

name: Solo Collective
description: The Camp for People Who Have No Camp: the Solo Collective is an opportunity to network with other solo travelers, share resources, and share your experience. We value self-sufficiency and fun, and we warmly welcome new members; please see our web site for information on how to join us.

name: Space Vikings
description: Space Vikings come to enslave you! Come on over and enjoy fire performance at night, or try your luck at the Wheel of Misfortune in the daytime.

name: Space Virgin Light Continuum
description: Chasing space demons across the universe, the Space Virgins have crashed into the floating world! Come play with us in our alien space lounge, and we’ll help you burn your own space demons down!

name: Spacelounge
description: Come to Spacelounge — giving drinks and beats since before you were born.

name: Spaghetti Western Camp
description: We will be serving vegan spaghetti from 5-7 on Wednesday, Thursday and Friday as well as showing the old Clint Eastwood spaghetti western movies. Join us.

name: Sparseland County
description: Formerly Hearth Camp and now the daytime home to four giant fire cauldrons of The Encompassment Project. Choose a heading and help push a flaming vessel into the night.

name: Spherocity
description: Spherocity is a microcosm community in which large interconnecting geodescic spheres, each inhabited by a unique sensory experience, invite all into a visceral world unbound by rules. Come release into the Amusement Dome, feel the TactilE Dome, chill in the Great White North Dome, dance in the Orange Dome and so much more…

name: Spock Mountain Research Labs
description: Jed Sanders and his band of cyberbilly hyperscientists bring their MOBILE SCIENCE SHACK back to the Playa for the 5th straight year! Come enjoy the fascinating world of beverage science and leisure technology in a relaxed, hillbilly atmosphere.

name: Spoon Return Center
description: Delivering enlightenment and peace-of-mind to anyone with a spoon. Come in, cool down, and give your wayward spoon a new life.

name: Starlite Drive-in Movie Theatre
description: Theme double-features and midnight movies, professionally projected on a giant dive-in screen. A playa landmark, an art boat destination, and a space to swim in the currents of cinematic celluloid.

name: StarLust Lounge
description: StarLust, the original alien Center Camp barter bar – your before during and after party spot of nightly fun and foolishness. We have returned from our underwater expedition and have brought new tantilizing devices and liquids to unleash. Everynight a different theme, a different party, the same great hosts. Bring your libations and pleasure devices for experimentations. StarLust, the neighborhood bar where the locals and aliens meet.

name: Stimulus
description: Camp Stimulas will feature games, jell-o shots, watermellon and a photo studio. Come, play, take a shot, get shot, take home a portrait of your burning self.

name: Sub-Culture Island
description: We rise and claim our island and transport, the Sub-Liminal Submarine as it treks to far off watery distances on the playa, returning to our island of bubbles, misting, costuming, peace, love and gary.

name: Summer Camp
description: Summer Camp is about nostalgia — join us for arts and crafts, fishing and canoeing, and scary stories around the campfire. Re-meet yourself as a 10 year old at Camp, and see what you have to say.

name: Super Camp
description: Estradasphere and yoga all in super 16-bit! Booyah!

name: Supersnail
description: Hop! Wriggle! Stand very still. Sweat. Giggle. Be who you will.

name: Surfing Man
description: SURFING MAN at night will surf the playa, lit brillantly for all denizens of the deep to see He will be mounted on a sailboard and constructed of tubular carpet tubes and a paper mache head, He will burn in a fiery wipeout.

name: Swell Self-Esteem Service
description: Let the Swell Self-Esteem Service Station keep your ego running like a well-oiled machine. The Swell process is engineered to inflate your sense of self-worth and is the best thing you can do to prepare yourself for the party ahead. It’s a complete head flush and preventative ego-maintenance program that takes only a few minutes. The service includes a diagnostic vibe emissions test to ensure that you are in compliance with Burning Man’s strict rules for negativity pollution. Removal of existing mental blockages and flushing out other unwanted psychic funk will be performed daily at our camp featuring full diagnostic facilities to scan the following areas: 1) sense of self-worth/head inflation pressure 2) joie-de-vivre levels 3) positive mental alignment.

name: Swiss Army Camp
description: The all-purpose camp! From reggae to rock to house to drum circles. From raging parties to picnics to chill time. Movies? R/C racing? Bring it on! Email if you’re interested in helping/camping with us.

name: Synaesthesia
description: Synaesthesia bids you to join us in The Temple of Ebbing Reality. Through the powerful and ancient rituals of music and dance, we invite you to worship at the altar of your consciousness in our psychedelic, underwater temple. Amid magickal mermaids, otherworldly fish, holy shrines, esoteric relics and spellcrafting music, all fellow seekers, shaman djs, ecstatic dancers and others are welcome to conjure deities and divine consciousness in our sacred, subaqueous realm.

name: Tabstop Faction
description: Donate words to the cause and watch them transformed into short, unpredictable stories on our trusty manual typewriters, or sit down behind the typewriter yourself! Tips on improvisational writing will be provided.

name: Tarwater
description: Ware sailor; here there be aliens, and we be registering everyone of them on the planet Tarwater’s temporary island. We’re setting down on the floating sea and setting up our alien registry, complete with self-serve bowling, an eye-opening ring toss, rides in the H.M.S. Kuru, and music by Lord Xibalba — drop by and tell us what planet you’re from.

name: Tazii
description: Come relax in luxurious Moroccan splendor at Tazii! Yoga, music jams, general chill… in our beautiful festival tents, di-rect from Marrakesh…

name: Temple of Atonement
description: Black Rock City’s biggest and best BD/SM theme camp. Confess your sins to the Judge and be cleansed of the evils in your soul. Enjoy a cocktail at our Black and Blues Bar or just groove to the Goth/Industrial tunes. Sin, repent, repeat.

name: Tengu Teahaus
description: Tengu are japanese demons, cunning and mischievous. Masters of mimicry, they feign the shapes of beasts, priests and teahaus denizens. All this not to say that we will engage in the traditional tengu rite of kami-kakushi, or divine kidnapping. Of course, it’s not to say that we won’t. All are welcome to sample the pleasures and terrors of the tengu teahaus.

name: Texas Village
description: Barter Bob’s Forgotten Supplies, The Necklace Factory, The Costume Exchange all return to Burning Man. You need it/we have it/come and get it.

name: ThinAIR
description: ThinAIR brings you impersonal hassle of modern airline travel with the swank styling of the heyday of the jet age. Come book a ticket to nowhere and revel in our posh airport lounge — the line forms over there…

name: Three Mile Island
description: Come visit beautiful Three Mile Island, shining symbol of progress and landmark site of nuclear meltdown! Relax among friends beneath the romantic green glow of the cooling towers, who knows, you might even mutate!

name: Thunderdome
description: Post – apocaliptic social setting featuring dome battles, dancing, preformances, bar, fire art, art cars, and parades.

name: Tittyman Camp
description: Come see the tittyman and leave your prints at Burning Man.

name: TOTEM
description: Once again, TOTEM (Temple Of The Eternal Mysteries) brings the gift of healing massage to Black Rock City. Earn a backrub or a therapeutic massage by meeting our mysterious criteria. Crawl in, float home! Experienced massagers and builders, please join us.

name: Toys for Tits
description: Do your part to make Black Rock beautiful: come to Toys for Tits to make your very own pair of Playa Pasties. Men, don’t forget–you have nipples, too!

name: Trampaloid
description: Come make memories that last a lifetime at the Trampaloid’s free anti-gravitational photo  studio! We provide the costumes, the polaroids, the jaw-droppingly realistic magical backdrop, and the trampolining device; you provide the bounce and your beautiful smile.

name: Tribal Thunder Camp
description: All for Drums and Drums for All! Tribal Thunder Camp is a marvelous place to play and learn that constant, friendly, same, ONE, playa beat that you begin to understand around your third night out here. peace

name: Trolltown (within the conglomerate)
description: Need a buddy to share your experiences in Black Rock City? Stop by Trolltown and adopt your very own troll! Ask about our ‘trade-a-troll’ program!

name: Turning Hand Community (THC)
description: Turning Hand Community is an eclectic assemblage of individual and small group projects coming together as one in the beneficent shadow of The Hand. This year’s installations are The Hand (of course), the T.H.C. Family Fun Center, Turning Hand Theatre, Pinky’s Bar, Porno Lanes, the Misting Dome and anything else we think of. Most pieces are open to 24×7 or until we pass out.

name: UNsurewood Forest
description: Come frolic with woodland nymphs and faeries in a celestial… yeah, right! We don’t know what the hell our theme is and frankly we’re not sure we care. Dance merrily whilst drunk on our druid liquors, use “ye” or “thee” in a sentence and be laughed at by total strangers. We’re unsure of what may lie in store, so wander in and help us dismantle reality.

name: UnVillage
description: Welcome to the UnVillage, a place where you can camp with friends in a relaxed atmosphere, free from stress. This UnVillage is being put together by the locals of the Texas regional burn and our friends from around the world.

name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee Camp
description: Come be refreshed with yummy caffeinated drinks! Hang out in our pyramid or shaded bamboo grove while you enjoy your coffee hot or cold.

name: Voo Doo Shooting Gallery
description: Back for a second year of fun with black magic, blow guns, darts and little hanging dolls, its The Voo Doo Shooting Gallery. Creating zombies every single day, join us for the big doll burn. ‘in every body’s mind there’s a little voodoo.’

name: Vume
description: A giant version of the VU Meters that you see on audio equipment. Each ‘channel’ (right and left) will have ten 15′ towers that are strung from top to bottom with multi-colored lights. The towers are arranged outward to either side of a small center stage. The brightness and sequencing of each tower’s colors are sensitive to audio input from a microphone mounted on the stage.

name: VW Bus Camp
description: VW Bus Camp is back for our 5th consecutive year. Eclectic bus owners unite, share the nomadic spirit in the Bus Camp Lounge with good food, good drink, and of course great vibes. (And yes, our water-cooled friends are welcome also)

name: WaCkY ShAcK sPaCeDuB vIbRaTiOn
description: Join our collective conscience community and imagine yourself in fully immersive audio/video dreamscape. When you reach our camp *POOF* your there. Some of the most amazing DJ’s, Visualists, live PA’s and tribal music producers will join our orgy of dance and celebration on a truly amazing soundsystem. Surrounded by surreal visuals, lighting, blacklight art installations and tapestries similar to that of the Blacklight Glowstar of 2000, join us on our journey through the Chakras to the stars. During the day yoga, tai chi, body painting, massage, jemelry making, poetry, spoken word, chakra workshops, and our tea hut will help along with ambient, dub, chillout, IDM and tribal rythems to sooth your body from the heat of the day.

name: West Side Story Fish Encampment
description: Jets (industrialization/man/pollution/jet skis) vs. the Sharks (fish, jellyfish, sea creatures). Play Environment vs. Pollution games and experience art performances by the Santa Barbarian Fire Conclave troupe.

name: Whale Dream Translation Project
description: Relax, listen to the ambient sounds of our friends, the Cetaceans. What do you hear? Sleep, perchance to dream, and when you awake, record your thoughts for posterity.

name: Whale Mail Delivery Center
description: Our enormous whale swallowed the missing link and we have the skeletal remains to prove it! Come and interact with the skeleton AND drop off packages and mail to be delivered to any posted address in Black Rock or camps with mailboxes.

name: Whimsea Shel Garden
description: A walk through garden of the wild, wacky, whimiscal poetry of Shel Silverstein. We’ll have a special treasure for our fellow geocachers.

name: Whistleworks
description: The Burning Chicagoans present: The Whistleworks Steam Whistle Project. The Wistleworks will allow the citizens of Black Rock City to become ceramic artists and help build a steam powered musical sculpture that once complete, will be the centerpiece of drum circle performance. In the floating world, The Steam Whistle will turn water into music.

name: White Trash Camp
description: Cleatus says: Cummon over and join in, we got pork rinds, Millie’s secret delight, and you should see what Betty Anne Sue can do with cheeze wiz and miracle whip! Mullets Rule!

name: Women's Temple
description: Women’s Temple is a place where women believe in the healing powers of coming together and sharing the wisdom of their embodied spirits with each other.

name: Wonderland
description: We are making a very cool black light chill out dome. We are diverse and creative people looking for others to help and participate in our camp.

name: Woonami Village
description: Rejoice at the inception of WOONAMI VILLAGE, which will include The Woo Woo Field, Glamour Goblins Grotto, and Kamp Kaosmosis… bringing you live music on the wheels of the Tsunami Bus, interactive in-camp excitement, Flaming Typewriters, and the sonic marvel… the AURAL REEF.

name: Wrong Side of the Trax
description: A great place to catch a ride on the Dave Train and see how folks on the other side of the Trax live. Be sure to stop by and wish our very own Yoshy and Amber many years of matrimonial bliss.

name: Xara
description: Xara is… a world-within-a-world: an immersive and interactive environment of jungle ruins, theatrical rainforest, strange creatures, living grass and settling mists. It is a place of exploration and hospitality, of dreaming and of dancing, of deep jungle secrets, and the living fever of music. “Xara yet is still to come, yet Xara here remains.”

name: Yellow Solar Seed Station
description: The mission of The Yellow Solar Seed Station is to invite others to join our community in playing with energy in all of its forms, infusing our conscious use of solar and wind power, our broadcast of a diverse spectrum of sound expression, and our shared lust for existence.

name: Yellow Submarine
description: In the town where I was born, there lived a man who sailed the seas, and he told us of his life in the yellow submarine. We all live in a yellow submarine…

name: You Are My Zooplankton - Come Closer
description: Become absorbed into the jelly world, three 12 feet in diameter jelly rooms. Where you can listen to enchanting sounds patched together from floating debris – picked up from various playa ports, watch performances and puppetshows, and pretend you’re dead and float through the night. Let us whisk you away, you little zooplankton, in our jelly mobile and deliver you to our medusas of the sea.

name: Z-Axis TV
description: Have you ever wanted to act out your favorite movie, play, or television show scenes? Got a good improvisation? C’mon down to Z-Axis TV and do it all!

name: Ze Arc
description: You can fly! Please come visit Ze Arc of Hawaii, a tetrahedral pyramid of spatialized audio. Be vibrated with your friends by the wet rhythm of ambient water vibrators mounted in the pyramid’s stage. Experience an audio aquarium of marine mammals of the world swimming through the air around you in tetrahedral audio. Join us at Ze Arc on Monday, Tuesday, and Wednesday to create a shrine to Hawaii, the Pacific Ocean, and Pacific Rim ring of fire with a raised playa earth 80 foot diameter earth ring encircling the pyramid with scaled volcano and crater mounds of the Pacific Rim volcanoes. Sunday night after the burn come to the black light temple Ze Arc for the DANCE OF THE LUMINOUS at midnight. We love space!

name: Zenplicity Camp
description: A place to reflect, pull up an ass pillow, tend the Zen garden, drink some tea, and escape the sun.
